Attributes.description: Exploring issues and topics in interactive digital media and culture through the creation of critical contemporary art. Includes technical instruction with a focus on the development of individual and group projects.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of VISA 210, VISA 287, FINA 287.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Wed, Start Time: 9:00, End Time: 12:00
